ygData.subject: Re: Clinging Darkness
ygData.msgSnippet: i dont wait til they run i usually cast it first thing when faced with a tougher opponent, then when the opponent decided to run, i cast it again to slow the
ygData.messageBody:
i dont wait til they run
i usually cast it first thing when faced with a tougher opponent, then when
the opponent decided to run, i cast it again to slow the retreat



----------
> From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Re: Clinging Darkness
> Date: Saturday, May 01, 1999 1:47 AM
>
> From: "Xillith ofNeriak" <xillith@...>
>
> Why wait 'till they run?
>
> I hit them with it as a lure and thereby allow my self and or my
party
> alot more time to "soften" the target before the meele.
>
> Food for thought.
>
> >From: <pwolf@...>
> >Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> >To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
> >Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Re: Clinging Darkness
> >Date: Fri, 30 Apr 1999 12:49:38 -0700
> >
> >From: <pwolf@...>
> >
> >I find clinging darkness useful on retreating opponents, for it slows
them
> >down. need not cast it on every fight, but it has its uses. I dont know
of
> >the damage, but its a level 4 necro spell. I should perhaps discover how
> >much damage it does.
> >
> >----------
> > > From: Eric Muringer <muringer@...>
> > > To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Clinging Darkness
> > > Date: Friday, April 30, 1999 10:47 AM
> > >
> > > From: "Eric Muringer" <muringer@...>
> > >
> > > Doen anyone know how much damage this does? Someone told me it costs
20
> >mana
> > > which seems pretty cheap. I see myself casting it every fight.
> > >
> > >
> > >
